item.title: No Guns Allowed
item.description: [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/so_far_away.md#will-you-stay-vyl-wnanory|Money makes a man and that’s a crime]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/so_far_away.md#will-you-stay-vyl-wnanory|If we all were rich we’d spend more time]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/so_far_away.md#will-you-stay-vyl-wnanory|With our daughters and sons, they’re loosing their minds]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/so_far_away.
